New Records: Sri Lanka recorded their first bilateral ODI series win since 1997
Key Match Events: Dunith Wellalage took 5 wickets for 14 runs
Virat Kohli scored 20 runs before being dismissed
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka were expected to perform well due to their spinners
India's batting order faced challenges against the spinners
Rohit Sharma emphasized the need for better execution in the middle overs
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed frustration with the team's performance
The match highlighted India's struggles against spin in low-turning conditions
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was dry and challenging for batters
Sri Lanka's spinners played a crucial role in the victory
